00047 
00048 class TSquare : public TShape
00049 {
00050         SO_NODE_HEADER(TSquare);
00051 public:
00052         TSquare( );

00055         double GetVolume() const {return 0.0;};
00056         BBox GetBBox() const;
00057         QString GetIcon() const;
00058 
00059         bool Intersect(const Ray &ray, double *tHit, DifferentialGeometry *dg ) const;
00060         bool IntersectP( const Ray &ray ) const;

00062 
00063         SoSFDouble m_sideLength;
00064

00067         NormalVector GetNormal(double u, double v) const;

00073 };
